name: Ludum Dare 43 - Blodd in the Woods
name_original: Ludum Dare 43 - Blodd in the Woods
description:
This is the story of the blood magician Blodd following his dreams of become a great wizard. To do this he follows an old ritual forcing him to sacrifice as many creatures as possible. With each sacrifice he comes closer to his goal, closer to his dream, closer to his faith. And after all it will be worth it… - or will it?

This is the first game we published, we hope you still enjoy it..

Changelog:

Some users experienced immortal enemies or not shown Bullets. This was fixed.
